entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
